alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Okeechobee; Osceola; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 29 at 2:20PM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Minimum temperatures as low as 26 expected, mainly in colder outlying and rural areas. Widespread sub freezing temperatures are expected otherwise. * WHERE...Osceola, Okeechobee and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Small animals not normally conditioned to the cold temperatures should be adequately cared for.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in- ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Okeechobee; Osceola; Southern Lake County
